Mike Harris suffered an arteriovenous malformation rupture in June 2016.

The rupture caused bleeding into the brain, which caused immediate symptoms and ended his playing career.

He fell into a depressive state, battling a dark mental space and suicidal thoughts as a result.

Working with therapists, he no longer allows the stutter to define his identity.
